CustomField.formula: if(isblank( LastName ),'Nom,','') + ' ' + if(isblank( Email ),'Adresse e-mail,','') + ' ' + if(isblank( text( Fonction__c) ),'Fonction,','') + ' ' + if(AND(isblank( Phone ),ISBLANK( MobilePhone )),'Téléphone,','') + ' ' + if(isblank( text(ServiceDepartement__c) ),'Service/département','')
CustomField.label: Data Quality - Description
